devdoc.details: Implementation of DLoopIncreaseLeverageBase with Odos swap functionality

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

params._flashLender: Address of the flash loan provider

increaseLeverage(uint256,uint256,bytes,a.details: Increases leverage with flash loans      - Flash loans debt tokens, swaps to collateral tokens, calls increaseLeverage, uses received debt tokens to repay flash loan

params.additionalCollateralFromUser: Additional collateral token amount from user (can be 0)
params.dLoopCore: Address of the DLoopCore contract to use
params.debtTokenToCollateralSwapData: Swap data from debt token to collateral token
params.minOutputDebtTokenAmount: Minimum amount of debt token to receive (slippage protection)

returns.receivedDebtTokenAmount: Amount of debt tokens received from increase leverage operation

params.data: Additional data passed to the flash loan
params.initiator: Address that initiated the flash loan

returns._0: bytes32 The flash loan callback success bytes

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueToken(address,address,uint256).details: Rescues tokens accidentally sent to the contract (except for the collateral token and debt token)

params.receiver: Address to receive the rescued tokens
params.token: Address of the token to rescue

setMinLeftoverDebtTokenAmount(address,ad.details: Sets the minimum leftover debt token amount for a given dLoopCore and debt token

params.minAmount: Minimum leftover debt token amount for the given dLoopCore and debt token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: DLoopIncreaseLeverageOdos
